row.process:
! Attach python file to prepare running :ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.STORE", "BACKUP_ENV_VAR", T :SET &FILENAME# = STR_CAT(&$AGENT_RESOURCES_TASK#, "pck_websphere_backup_env_var.py") : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = 'java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#itpa-tool.jar" '
: SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, 'arb -cmd execute ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&WSADMIN#" ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '-user "&UC4RB_WAS_USERNAME#" ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '-password "&UC4RB_WAS_PASSWORD#" ') : IF &UC4RB_WAS_HOST_TEMP# <> "localhost" : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '-host &UC4RB_WAS_HOST_TEMP# ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '-port &UC4RB_WAS_PORT# ') : ENDIF
: SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '-f "&FILENAME#" ')
! Add list argument of python to command : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&UC4RB_WAS_WSADMINLIB#" ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&UC4RB_WAS_UTILSLIB#" ') : SET &UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY#, '\', '/') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY#" ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&UC4RB_WAS_SCOPE#" ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&UC4RB_WAS_VAR_NAME#" ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_VAR_VALUE# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_WAS_VAR_VALUE#, '\', '/') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&UC4RB_WAS_VAR_VALUE#" ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"_PREF:&UC4RB_WAS_NODE_NAME#" ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"_PREF:&UC4RB_WAS_CLUSTER_NAME#" ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"_PREF:&UC4RB_WAS_SERVER_NAME#" ') : SET &UC4RB_BACKUP_REPORT# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_BACKUP_REPORT#, '\', '/') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&UC4RB_BACKUP_REPORT#" ') &UC4RB_WAS_CMD#
